segments.content: In a few seconds, you will **receive an email** from me asking you to confirm your newsletter subscription.
segments.sourceMdx: In a few seconds, you will **receive an email** from me asking you to confirm your newsletter subscription.
segments.translated_content: 几秒钟后，您将**收到一封邮件**，需要确认订阅才能生效。

segments.content: Please open your inbox and **confirm your email address** to finalize your subscription.
segments.sourceMdx: Please open your inbox and **confirm your email address** to finalize your subscription.
segments.translated_content: 请打开收件箱并**确认您的邮箱地址**以完成订阅流程。

segments.content:
:::tip[Check your spam folder]

If you don't receive any confirmation email, check your spam folder 😅

The email will come from `sebastien@thisweekinreact.com`

:::
segments.sourceMdx:
:::tip[Check your spam folder]

If you don't receive any confirmation email, check your spam folder 😅

The email will come from `sebastien@thisweekinreact.com`

:::
segments.translated_content:
:::tip[检查垃圾邮件文件夹]

如果未收到确认邮件，请检查垃圾邮件文件夹 😅

邮件发件人将显示为 `sebastien@thisweekinreact.com`

:::
